Name: Cryptr
About the game: Cryptr is a new dungeon crawler, hack and slash adventure style game with RPG elements. Cryptr aims to be a fun game featuring the works of many artists. Currently, Cryptr is single-player with multiple playable classes: Skeleton Mage (caster staff), Knight (sword and shield), Fallen Knight (two-handed sword), Myrddin (caster staff), Ravager (dual sword), Fighter (punch/kick), and Archer (bow and arrow). Early Access is anticipated to be mid to late 2022 (Summer or later ideally). Pricing will remain the same per copy during and after Early Access.
